original_title: A Fish Called Martha or: Who's Really Afraid of H. P. Lovecraft Anyway?
overview: It's out of the frying pan and into George and Martha's rumpus room for a night of supernatural mambo jumbo when young H.P. and his slim-hipped wife, fleeing a monster of cosmic proportions, seek refuge on the campus of the infamous Miskatonic University in this outrageous parody of things Lovecraft and Hollywood.
title: A Fish Called Martha or: Who's Really Afraid of H. P. Lovecraft Anyway?
